title: Owagee
author: Owagee
content: I was getting tired of attending the same old crypto events that didn’t offer anything new or exciting. But then, I stumbled upon the lucky wheel event hosted by Bitget. And let me tell you, it’s going to be an experience like no other, especially for the Aussies.Finally, a hassle-free experience! And let’s talk about the rewards for a moment – they are simply amazing. Just imagine having some fun and earning crypto at the same time— A $100,000 Prize Pool, a MacBook Air M2 and an Amazon $2000 voucher. What do you guys think?

comments.author: Incarts
comments.created_time: July 13, 2023, 01:48:15 PMLast edit: July 13, 2023, 02:49:15 PM by Incarts
comments.body: Oh wow, sounds pretty cool, at a time when Australian crypto enthusiasts have faced lots of set back from regulations, this could be the good distraction they need to stay profitable. How can one join the event? I know a few Aussies who would definitely love this

comments.author: Cryptoababe
comments.body: I don’t really participate in these events, never been lucky lol. But my folks commends this exchange events and says it always profitable. Will probably check them out later.

comments.author: Nonstopspider
comments.body: I was lucky in the past, i didn't get the Fat Prize but worth try it

comments.author: Cryptoababe
comments.body: Quote from: Nonstopspider on July 13, 2023, 07:30:46 PMI was lucky in the past, i didn't get the Fat Prize but worth try itHmm. So far it worth it, I will definitely give it a try then. I guess I gotta create an account with them. It should be an easy one for me.
